name: Honor GT 2 Pro
highlights:
Not announced yet

Android 16, MagicOS 10
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Giant rhino glass), aluminum frame, fiber-reinforced plastic back
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, 4320Hz PWM, HDR Vivid, 1600 nits (HBM), 6000 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/2.0, (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.4, (telephoto), 1/2.0", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 122˚ (ultrawide), AF

COMMS.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L1+L5), GLONASS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass
